answers.answer: Yes can be a sign of preeclampsia

I've been having that same problem, & I get really sweaty & feel like I'm gonna pass out my vision gets blurry so I need to sit on floor or lay down & feel like I'm gonna throw up but nothing:(

sorry u feel that way! How far r u? I never get like this so thats why im goin in to the doc. I didnt even have nausea really in the beginnin..no mornin sickness or anything so im scared and hopin everything is fine
Everything was ok but gotta go back monday to get my blood pressur checked and bc i gain almost 7 pounds in 6 days plus bc of the pain in my ribs

He said its jus the blood flow to ur head.. idk.. im not to worried now.. but the fast weight gain concerns me bc my appetite is so small now i dont see how i gained that much so fast

title: should i call doc?
